SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_RATECHANGE_RESPONSE_SCANNER
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Retrieves the data for the given Sponsor during rate change response scanner process.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_RATECHANGE_RESPONSE_SCANNER ( @LOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = null ) as begin
declare @AppealId uniqueidentifier; declare @SponsorId uniqueidentifier = null;
select @SponsorId = ID from dbo.CONSTITUENT where LOOKUPID = @LOOKUPID
if @SponsorId is null begin select 'Sponsor ID not found' as SponsorName end else begin -- must get the appealid for the 2014 rate increase appeal: there are two, so get the right one select @AppealId = ID from dbo.APPEAL where [NAME] like '%10555%' --like '%Rate Increase 2014%'
select conSponsor.[NAME] , soc.[NAME] , sc.LOOKUPID , so.LOOKUPID , r.LOOKUPID --r.TRANSACTIONTYPE, , r.AMOUNT , dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE.FREQUENCY , s.ID , conSponsor.ID as SPONSORID , ISNULL(dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.[DESCRIPTION], '') as SEGMENTCATEGORY , ISNULL(dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL.ID,'00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') as CONSTITUENTAPPEALID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc ON sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc ON soc.ID = so.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID --ft.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = r.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT conSponsor ON conSponsor.ID = r.CONSTITUENTID --join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM ft ON ft.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID --ebf2dd6a-8377-47fb-a976-2e3b13cb7a18 join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE on r.ID = REVENUESCHEDULE.ID left join dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL on dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL.CONSTITUENTID = r.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT ON dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.ID = dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENTID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTATION ON dbo.MKTSEGMENTATION.ID = dbo.MKTSEGMENTATIONSEGMENT.SEGMENTATIONID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENT on dbo.MKTSEGMENT.ID = SEGMENTID left join dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE on dbo.MKTSEGMENTCATEGORYCODE.ID = dbo.MKTSEGMENT.SEGMENTCATEGORYCODEID where conSponsor.LOOKUPID = @LOOKUPID and s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE = 2 -- recurring gift and dbo.CONSTITUENTAPPEAL.APPEALID = @AppealId order by sc.LOOKUPID --, soc.[NAME] end
end
